faq.question: How do I get started?
faq.answer: Simply contact us via WhatsApp to choose your subscription plan. Once payment is confirmed, we'll send you your login credentials and setup instructions immediately.

faq.question: What devices are supported?
faq.answer: Our service works on Smart TVs, Android boxes/devices, iOS devices, MAG boxes, Formuler, and any device that supports IPTV players like IPTV Smarters Pro, TiviMate, or GSE IPTV.

faq.question: Do you offer a trial?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer a 24-hour trial to test our service. Contact us on WhatsApp to request a trial.

faq.question: What channels are included?
faq.answer: We offer {{count}}+ channels including USA, UK, Canada, Sports, Movies, and international channels. All premium channels and PPV events are included.

faq.question: How stable is the service?
faq.answer: We use premium servers with 99.9% uptime and automatic backup servers. Our streams are high quality with minimal to no buffering.
